    {Ω : Type*} [MeasurableSpace Ω] {P : MeasureTheory.Measure Ω} [MeasureTheory.IsProbabilityMeasure P]
    {A B : Set Ω} (hA : MeasurableSet A) (hB : MeasurableSet B)

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
• A and B are any two events in a probability space.
Therefore, we conclude:
• P(A ∪ B) = P(A) + P(B) - P(A ∩ B) [l1].
proof_steps.lean_tactics:
have l1 : P (A ∪ B) + P (A ∩ B) = P A + P B :=
    MeasureTheory.measure_union_add_inter P hA hB
